trans-unit.source: Specifies what kind of HTTP request data to validate.
trans-unit.target: Angir hvilken type HTTP-forespørselsdata til å validere.

trans-unit.source: You can create a custom request validation type by implementing the <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator> type.
trans-unit.target: Du kan opprette en egendefinert validering av typen ved implementering av <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator>type.</xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator>

trans-unit.source: When ASP.NET calls the <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A> method to validate a request, ASP.NET passes a `requestValidationSource` parameter to specify the source of the data being validated.
trans-unit.target: Når ASP.NET kaller den <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>metode for å validere en forespørsel, ASP.NET sender en `requestValidationSource` å angi kilden til dataene valideres.</xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The RequestValidationSource enumeration is used to specify the source or kind of request data that is being validated.
trans-unit.target: Opplistingen RequestValidationSource brukes til å angi kilde- eller forespørselen datatypen som valideres.

trans-unit.source: The enumeration indicates the type of HTTP input that is passed in the `value` parameter of the <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Opplistingen angir typen HTTP-inndata som er sendt av `value` -parameteren for den <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the enumeration as a way to fall back to the base request validation implementation for HTTP inputs if you do not want to validate using custom logic.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke opplistingen som en måte å gå tilbake til base forespørselen validering implementering for HTTP-inndata hvis du ikke vil validere ved hjelp av egendefinerte logic.

trans-unit.source: The request cookies.
trans-unit.target: Forespørsel-informasjonskapsler.

trans-unit.source: The `collectionKey` parameter of the <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A> method is set to the name of the cookie in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den `collectionKey` -parameteren for den <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>er satt til navnet på informasjonskapselen i samlingen.</xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `value` parameter of the <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A> method is set to the value in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den `value` -parameteren for den <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>er satt til verdien i samlingen.</xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: The uploaded file.
trans-unit.target: Opplastede filen.

trans-unit.source: The `collectionKey` parameter of the <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A> method is set to the name of the uploaded file in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den `collectionKey` -parameteren for den <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>er satt til navnet på filen opplastet i samlingen.</xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `value` parameter of the <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A> method is set to the value of the uploaded file in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den `value` -parameteren for den <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>metoden som er angitt til verdien for den opplastede filen i samlingen.</xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: The form values.
trans-unit.target: Skjemaverdier.

trans-unit.source: The `collectionKey` parameter of the <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A> method is set to the name of the form parameter in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den `collectionKey` -parameteren for den <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>er satt til navnet på formen-parameteren i samlingen.</xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `value` parameter of the <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A> method is set to the value of the form parameter in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den `value` -parameteren for den <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>er satt til verdien for parameteren formatet i samlingen.</xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: The request headers.
trans-unit.target: Forespørselshodene.

trans-unit.source: The `collectionKey` parameter of the <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A> method is set to the name of an HTTP header in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den `collectionKey` -parameteren for den <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>er satt til navnet på en HTTP-overskrift i samlingen.</xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `value` parameter of the <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A> method is set to the value of the HTTP header in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den `value` -parameteren for den <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>metoden som er angitt til verdien for HTTP-hode i samlingen.</xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: The virtual path.
trans-unit.target: Den virtuelle banen.

trans-unit.source: The `collectionKey` parameter of the <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A> method is set to `null` (`Path` is not a collection of values).
trans-unit.target: Den `collectionKey` -parameteren for den <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>er satt til `null` (`Path` er ikke en samling av verdier).</xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `value` parameter of the <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A> method is set to the value of the Path field.
trans-unit.target: Den `value` -parameteren for den <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>er satt til verdien i feltet banen.</xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: An HTTP <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.PathInfo*> string, which is an extension to a URL path.
trans-unit.target: En HTTP- <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.PathInfo*>streng, som er et tillegg til en URL-adresse.</xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.PathInfo*>

trans-unit.source: The `collectionKey` parameter of the <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A> method is set to `null` (`PathInfo` is not a collection of values).
trans-unit.target: Den `collectionKey` -parameteren for den <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>er satt til `null` (`PathInfo` er ikke en samling av verdier).</xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `value` parameter of the <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A> method is set to the value of the PathInfo field.
trans-unit.target: Den `value` -parameteren for den <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>er satt til verdien i feltet PathInfo.</xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: The query string.
trans-unit.target: Søkestrengen.

trans-unit.source: The `collectionKey` parameter of the <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A> method is set to the name of the query string parameter in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den `collectionKey` -parameteren for den <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>er satt til navnet på tilkoblingsstrengen Spørringsparameteren i samlingen.</xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `value` parameter of the <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A> method is set to the value of the query-string parameter in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den `value` -parameteren for den <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>er satt til verdien for parameteren spørringsstrengen i samlingen.</xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: The raw URL.
trans-unit.target: Raw URL-adressen.

trans-unit.source: (The part of a URL after the domain.)
trans-unit.target: (Del av en URL-adresse etter domenet.)

trans-unit.source: The `collectionKey` parameter of the <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A> method is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Den `collectionKey` -parameteren for den <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>er satt til `null`.</xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>

trans-unit.source: (`RawUrl` is not a collection of values.) The `value` parameter of the <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A> method is set to the value of the RawUrl field.
trans-unit.target: (`RawUrl` er ikke en samling av verdiene.) Den `value` -parameteren for den <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>er satt til verdien i feltet RawUrl.</xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.
